name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Websites ranks and Google search options

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Popularity ratings and search options in Google search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes it's hard to find what you are looking for.

This extension adds a rating beside each Google result. 
A rating of (10) means highly popular website, (0) means not so popular. 
The number is given by google-independent rankings (myip.ms service). 
When choosing to open a Google result, it's usually a good idea to choose the higher number. 
 
This extension also provides an option menu to clean intrusive search results from Google! No more ads, related searches, people also ask, multiple links, video previews, thumbnail images, snippets, widgets, etc. Thanks to the Google search options, you can hide something (for example only ads) and keep everything else, or you can hide all the intrusive contents and get just the text-based search results!

This extension is not supported by Google. It's a safe beta and requires no special permissions. Kindly report any problem or suggestion and please, if you don't like something, please send me an email and do not leave a negative review. I will do my best to help you!
